remarks: Lemma for ~ hsmex .  Bound the order type of a union of sets of ordinals, each of limited order type.  Vaguely reminiscent of ~ unictb but use of order types allows to canonically choose the sub-bijections, removing the choice requirement.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
